snippet.title: SpellRogue - 1.0 Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Ghost Ship Publishing and Guidelight Games are excited to announce that its dice-wielding roguelike deckbuilder, SpellRogue, will be leaving Early Access and launching into 1.0 on April 24th.

After one year of Early Access, the 1.0 launch will introduce SpellRogue’s epic story conclusion with the Final Chapter bringing about the game’s True Ending, alongside a brand-new playable wizard, Sefyra the Windcaller.

Wishlist SpellRogue now and get notified at launch:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1990110/SpellRogue/

--------------------
SpellRogue is a turn-based, deckbuilding roguelike where you cast powerful spells using your Mana Dice, gain legendary artifacts, upgrade your spells and experiment with potent combinations to annihilate the Voidwalkers corrupting the world.
--------------------
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1990110/SpellRogue/

--------------------
Find out more:
https://www.spellrogue.com/

Follow Spellrogue:
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/SpellRogue/
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/5AnXVPCqyx
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Spellrogue
